usa: Estêvão Gomes landed in the neighborhood of Chesapeake Bay and took formal possession on behalf of the King of Spain. The massacre was revenged by Mendez some time afterward.<sup id="cite_ref-The_Powhatan_Confederacy_page_129_4-1" class="reference">[4]</sup><sup id="cite_ref-jstor.org_5-1" class="reference">[5]</sup>
